Description: Telos.AI is a next-generation visual collaboration tool.
Full Description: Telos.ai is a Silicon Valley technology company with British roots. It uses AI and gaming technologies to build new kinds of cognitive collaborative solutions in the cloud. Their flagship product is the TelOS platform. Telos.ai is motivated by problems that involve a high degree of human creativity and typically involve aesthetic or abstract thinking. Examples include how to visualize abstract concepts like “cashflow” (e.g. see Cogni-Draw Rendering Engine). Their goal is to use cognitive computing to build solutions that amplify human creativity and productivity within the enterprise. They call this augmented creativity.  They do this by building the “conceptual thinking” of users into their platform. In other words, when someone makes a document, say a Powerpoint, its content extends beyond the page to a set of ideas encoded in the “mental models” of the workers. TelOS attempts to encode its own “mental model” of any content created on the platform.

Description: Blockchain SaaS platform for home mortgages that reduces friction across loan origination to securitization & Mortgage Backed Securities.
Full Description: Istakapaza - blockchain based SaaS platform that simplifies home mortgages & reduces friction across all primary & secondary participants. It can drive 2-2.5% improvement via identifiable source of data, non-tampered documents and cost-reduction (& improved cash flows by 25-60 days) due to avoidance of repeated validation of same documents as loans change hands from origination to securitization.  Mortgage origination is highly inefficient as it changes hands from originator/broker, to the warehousing bank, to investors, the servicers, to the agencies (Freddie/Fannie) & increasingly the Hedge Funds. The same mortgage documents are subject to repeated appraisals, underwriting and validations due to lack of security, trust in the system, and inadequate understanding of exact composition of loans. This entails duplicative costs, stuck cash-flows and a system based on distrust across the chain. Moreover,  homes gets refinanced every 3.6years (av.) but only 18% of borrowers go to the same lender  - poor customer retention across entire home-mortgage ecosystem. We run the entire loan origination documentation on blockchain making the platform the source of immutable & undeniable provenance for all mortgage documents. This  makes the loan process quicker & easier with improved borrower retention by 3X,  reduces time of closure on refinance, reduces duplicative costs and releases cash-flows for lenders in selling their loans to the investors, who in turn can convert loan pools faster and cheaper into mortgage backed securities (MBS),  traded by secondary market players. This helps manage rate-risks and market-risks more efficiently across the mortgage chain. There are many other related benefits configured too.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Information Technology, Real Estate, Software

Description: AgriEID is the leader in digital livestock management with an integrated heavy duty hardware and low cost mobile cloud software solution.
Full Description: AgriEID is the fastest growing cloud and mobile software company in this sector with an exponential growth rate of 10-15% per month since launch. 5,000+ livestock producers use AgriEID market leading integrated EID hardware and software technology with AgriEID customers located around the world in the United States, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, United Kingdom, and the European Union. The problem we solve : It is challenging today for small to medium sized livestock producers to collect and record accurate data on their animals and then act on that data to improve the profitability of their operation and health care for their animals. Our mission : Improve animal welfare and farmer profitability through an affordable and easy to use integrated hardware and software management solution.  To make it easy and inexpensive for livestock farmers to collect and understand their animals important data metrics and make smart educated decisions so their ranches can grow and flourish. To assist small to medium sized grass-fed livestock producers compete against large industrial producers who use factory farming technology to mass produce meat using hormones, steroids, antibiotics and processed feeds with no concern for animal welfare and provenance. Assist Livestock Farmers : ✓ Confidently build their dreams ✓ Grow to provide more jobs and support their community ✓ Share their values without fear ✓ Stop struggling and start growing Why is AgriEID so much less expensive ? ✓ We are 100% online so no sales commissions are paid to the traditional rural store networks ✓ We do not employ a team of expensive field sales reps ✓ We are 100% private so we don't have to pay dividends to shareholders ✓ We reinvest 100% of our profits back into the business to offer increasing value to our customers We are focused on growing our strong network of loyal customers and we understand that price is an important consideration for all hardworking folks living on the land. The AgriEID Story : For years we struggled to grow our cattle operation because there was no affordable computer system that allowed us to track and measure our livestock performance and profitability over time. Not even the established complicated and expensive solutions available on the market provided anywhere near the functionality and ease of use required to run a small to medium sized operation efficiently in 2022. This is WHY our local team has worked so hard over many years to design and build a better system which is now known as the AgriEID Digital Ranch System. We are revolutionising the grass fed livestock industry by making it effortless to collect animal data and act on it with the most advanced analytics tools available on any device - mobile, tablet and desktop. If you currently rely on best guestimates and crave the important data points required to grow your livestock business - then AgriEID is going to be the integrated solution you have been searching for over the years. Stop guessing and start using a system built from the ground up by cattle ranchers for small to medium sized producers. Large commercial ranchers have been using sophisticated EID digital systems and livestock management software for years to maximise operating efficiency and profitability. These legacy livestock management systems are cumbersome, outdated, expensive and require extensive product training, installation and ongoing technology support services. AgriEID combines low cost hardware (RFID Ear Tag Readers and Digital Weigh Scales) with a powerful cloud based Software platform that delivers a comprehensive and affordable livestock management solution direct to your iPad or tablet as you work on animals in real-time. We provide livestock producers with powerful analytics so their operations can be improved over time by focusing on top performing animals and ensuring the health of their animals is maximised for improved profitability. At AgriEID we work hard every day to assist American Ranchers of all ages to transition from pencil and paper to an easy to use digital management system with low cost optional hardware configurations. We are focused on delivering the right livestock monitoring technology and management tools at affordable prices to boost on-ranch production efficiencies. We provide easy to use and inexpensive management solutions to improve compliance and the profitability of your ranch over time. All our products are tested on farm in harsh working conditions and are guaranteed to be fully compliant with the USDA 840 EID tagging system 5,000+ livestock producers use our market leading electronic hardware and software solutions on a daily basis to manage 150,000+ head of cattle. AgriEID customers are located around the world in Australia, New Zealand, Canada, USA, European Union and the United Kingdom. AgriEID is a private 'farmer owned' company with all products designed and tested in real world livestock operating environments so you can be confident about the reliability and durability of AgriEID products.  The company was founded in Australia in 2011 and now has offices located world-wide supporting our customers and electronic ID product range. 100% of all profits are reinvested back into the business to further develop our technology and to improve the operation and profitability of hard working small to medium sized grass-fed livestock operations world-wide.

Our B2B sales programs transform the outbound sales process for companies that have established product-market fit and demonstrated customer delight, but are not yet positioned for growth. These sales acceleration services also enable go-to-market companies to generate the volume of conversations needed to close more customers and scale growth.  We are not an outsourced sales or lead generation service. Our proven B2B sales training and coaching programs help technical, clinical or academic leaders develop their own successful and sustainable outbound sales machine. In plain terms, we help you book more meetings via battle-tested, outbound account-based marketing tactics. Description: Flexible Vision is an AI machine vision software and hardware solution that solves complex visual inspections.
Full Description: Company Description: At Flexible Vision Inc., we are pioneering the future of manufacturing with our cutting-edge AI machine vision solutions. We specialize in the development of both hardware and software that empowers factory floors to reach new heights of efficiency, productivity, and quality. With a relentless commitment to innovation, we're redefining the way factories operate, making them smarter, faster, and more reliable than ever before. Our Vision: Our vision is to transform the manufacturing landscape by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and computer vision. We believe that technology should enhance the capabilities of the workforce, not replace it. Through our AI machine vision solutions, we aim to create a seamless fusion of human expertise and machine precision, creating a synergy that optimizes the entire production process. What Sets Us Apart: - End-to-End Solutions: We offer a comprehensive suite of AI machine vision products that cover every aspect of the manufacturing process. From quality control and defect detection to process optimization and predictive maintenance, we provide a one-stop solution for our clients. - Innovation and Customization: We understand that every factory is unique. That's why we prioritize innovation and customization, tailoring our solutions to meet the specific needs and challenges of each manufacturing facility. - Hardware Excellence: Our state-of-the-art hardware components are designed and engineered for durability and reliability in industrial settings, ensuring that our systems perform flawlessly on the factory floor. - Scalability: Whether you're a small manufacturing operation or a large-scale facility, our solutions are designed to scale with your needs, ensuring you're always prepared for growth and evolution. - Human-Centric Approach: We don't just focus on machines; we prioritize the well-being and expertise of the people working in the factory. Our technology is designed to augment their capabilities, making their work safer, more engaging, and more valuable. Industries We Serve: Our AI machine vision technology is applicable across a wide range of industries, including but not limited to: - Automotive - Electronics - Aerospace - Pharmaceuticals - Food and Beverage - Consumer Goods - Energy - And more Join Us in Transforming Manufacturing: At Flexible Vision Inc., we're on a mission to lead the charge in transforming manufacturing into a more intelligent, efficient, and sustainable industry. We invite forward-thinkers, innovators, and problem-solvers to join us in this journey. Together, we'll shape the future of manufacturing with the power of AI machine vision, creating a world where quality, precision, and productivity go hand in hand.
Headquarters Regions: Greater San Diego Area, West Coast, Western US

Description: Smoov is an AI driven application for couples to automatically split and manage shared finances together.
Full Description: Smoov is the first platform built to help couples automatically split and manage their shared expenses, before they have a shared bank account. Millions of couples are sending money back and forth every single day and money is the number one reason relationships fail. Today the process for splitting bills and expenses is manual, time consuming, and can be awkward or tense, plus no one likes doing math. Smoov makes it automatic, accurate and easy. While mirroring consumer behavior of sending money to each other via mobile. How? Smoov integrates with users' existing credit and debit cards and pulls transactions into a private running list.  This creates a very low barrier to entry and eliminates awkward conversations about signing up for a new card together - plus they don't want to do that anyway. Couples set up a default split % for all of their shared expenses that they can adjust on a per transaction basis if they want.  Users swipe which expenses they want to move from their private view to the couples shared view.  Smoov keeps track of the total damage (who owes who how much) and whenever the couple is ready, they can settle up via direct ACH transfer through Smoov. Why? Modern couples who value their financial autonomy are getting married later in life, with more independent wealth and studies show they are fully merging their respective finances less and less - in a world where timing is everything, Smoov fits perfectly into that macro trend among others.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Science and Engineering, Software

Full Description: Heron Farms is based in Charleston, South Carolina where it operates the world’s first indoor saltwater vertical farm. Heron Farms began as a research question posed by founder Sam Norton in graduate school; what if two of the 21st century’s largest problems, rising seawater levels and excess carbon dioxide, could be leveraged into next generation sustainable agriculture? Through his exploration of this exciting possibility grew Heron Farms. Since inception, Heron Farms has focused on scalable sustainability aided by sophisticated technologies. Description: Healthcare, Oncology, Analytics
Full Description: Vizlitics is a startup at the intersection of patient empowerment and clinician engagement. Beginning with cancer, Vizlitics has developed its first product called Cancer Insights (http://www.cancerinsights.com). Cancer Insights is a bi-directional oncology engagement platform for clinicians, patients and caregivers. The HIPAA platform is delivered as an iOS and Android App for clinicians to have a complete cross-hospital case summary of the patient, organize a multi-disciplinary tumor board, develop an optimal treatment plan, engage with fellow clinicians as well as collaborate with the patient and his/her caregivers for optimal treatment satisfaction. Clinicians can also encourage ePRO assessments. Patients using the Cancer Insights app are able to have access to their complete medical history, upcoming appointments and ePRO assessments as well as tailored educational content.  Cancer Insights integrates with EMR systems and has proprietary data transformation algorithms to transform FHIR and CCD data into meaningful insights. It has clinically validated oncology templates for clinicians to optimize diagnosis, test and treatment planning and follows Oncology Care Model (https://innovation.cms.gov/initiatives/oncology-care/), NCCN and AJCC guidelines.  Cancer Insights enables frictionless patient engagement, collaborative clinician collaboration, intelligent care insights and improved patient outcomes
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Health Care

FarmLink is a versatile product that can connect to pumps and valves of different sizes and types, and is controlled via a cloud-based platform that provides real-time data and analytics. The company is initially focusing on the Central Valley in California, which represents 7 million acres under irrigation, and plans to expand to other regions in the US and internationally in the near future. Full Description: User Evaluation is an AI-driven platform that acts as an innovative and powerful solution for customer understanding. It’s designed to help businesses and organizations uncover valuable user insights with various AI tools. The automated process of data analysis can extract key information from customer conversations and turn them into AI reports in seconds. By using state-of-the-art AI technology, the platform can transcribe text, audio, video, and CSV files from 57 different languages into clear and concise data. The user-friendly interface allows clients to customize and organize the workplace to their preference thanks to the intuitive Kanban board. By creating collections from the gathered data, one can easily keep track of their findings through AI tags and notes with content sources. One of the most beneficial features is effortlessly turning the gathered data into text-rich presentations and reports, enriched with AI-curated insights and data visualizations. This allows easy identification of patterns and trends, as well as paint points and areas of improvement. The white-labeling option allows the users to incorporate their brand's identity in every report they generate. With the easy sharing option, users can share their findings with a single click.  User Evaluation also features an intelligent AI chat assistant that can aid in data understanding, brainstorming ideas based on customer conversations, and generating bar graphs and flowcharts based on the instruction. Not only does it provide AI-powered insights, but it also cites the sources for an easier understanding. Discover the power of User Evaluation for free and unlock the potential of AI-generated insights!

Description: Beyond Login. Cyphlens protects Personal Identifiable Information and sensitive content when everything else fails.
Full Description: Protecting Personal Identifiable Information (PII) and sensitive content is hard. Even the most secure encryptions are vulnerable when users have to access them and view the underlying content. Unfortunately, today the only protection users have from anyone accessing their personal information and assets is their login. Cyphlens’ patent pending technology protects sensitive information viewed by the user in such a way that even if the user's online bank account is hacked or login credentials are stolen, account information protected by Cyphlens remains inaccessible to the attacker. Cyphlens protects sensitive content in documents, on websites, in emails, across all messaging platforms (e.g., Slack, Telegram, WhatsApp) and more.

Description: SmartRank is a software company that automates the job applicant screening process without needing or using a résumé.
Full Description: SmartRank is a next generation applicant screening & tracking software company that automates the job applicant screening process, stack-ranks & filters those job applicants, while providing hiring managers with the candidates that match their exact qualifications.  SmartRank does all of this screening without the need or use of a résumé. Because the résumé is not the primary input for screening, SmartRank is able to remove any demographic indicators (e.g., name, college attended, years of graduation, etc.) that typically create unconscious bias, which limits diversity, equity, and inclusion (DE&I).  This innovative model for screening provides recruiters more time because of better automation tools, enables hiring managers to hire the best candidates faster, and creates a uniquely better & unbiased experience for applicants. These benefits to stakeholders ultimately allow companies to reduce attrition, reduce costs, reduce legal & compliance liability, increase productivity, and achieve actionable & meaningful DE&I progress.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Denver Area, Western US

We believe that the CRM of the future is relationship-centric and should be built on top of a different set of assumptions: - It should be about relationships, not sales pipelines. Focus and priority are on the relationship with the person or organization. - It should encourage you to stay in touch with your valuable relationships. - It should not require an army of consultants to get started. Join Parma CRM and start building lasting business relationships today!

Description: GRC Viewpoint is an online and print magazine which features technology solution providers and eminent leaders
Full Description: Governance, risk, and compliance are a set of plans which are designed to ensure that an organization’s risk profile is managed in line with regulatory requirements. Generally speaking, it is used as a structured method of aligning IT with business objectives and addressing compliance requirements while effectively managing risk. The benefits of a well-planned GRC strategy can be many, including better management, improved decision-making, and better IT investments. Global governance, risk management, and compliance encompass a wide range of disciplines. In this context, enterprise security and risk mitigation play a critical role, even though every discipline has its own priorities. Large numbers of companies are building security solutions from digital to physical in order to protect enterprises, secure their data and infrastructure, and meet compliance goals. GRC is more than a collection of software tools, despite the number of good options available to streamline it. Rather than creating a GRC function from scratch, many organizations consult a framework for guidance on how to develop and refine it. Having the right security tools, solutions, and service providers means combating the right threat and aligning perfectly with compliance. This is where GRC Viewpoint magazine can help businesses identify the most innovative security and compliance providers to fit the unique needs of each business. Research at our firm involves hours and hours spent investigating the companies in the governance, risk and compliance space that have an edge in developing innovative solutions. An innovative team of industry veterans, editors, and cybersecurity specialists at GRC Viewpoint Magazine are continually exploring the latest and best security solutions available in the market, so you can save time and money trying to find the right partner. A print and digital version of our magazine provides CISOs and CIOs with the most up-to-date information on industry-wide security and compliance trends.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, East Coast, Northeastern US

Full Description: MyKidReports is a leading provider of childcare management solutions for preschoolers. The company is dedicated to revolutionizing the way preschools manage their operations by offering a range of tools and features that simplify administrative tasks and improve communication between parents and educators. With MyKidReports software, preschoolers can efficiently manage their enrollment, attendance tracking, billing, and reporting. The software is easy to use and can be accessed from any device, making it easy for staff to manage their tasks from anywhere. The company also offers a mobile app that allows parents to stay informed about their children's daily activities, such as meals, naps, and learning experiences. One of the key benefits of MyKidReports is the comprehensive reporting feature. The software provides detailed reports on each child's progress, including attendance, academic achievement, and behavioral development. The reports are customizable, allowing educators to tailor the information to meet the specific needs of each child. MyKidReports is committed to data security and ensures that all information is stored securely. The company uses the latest encryption technology to protect confidential information and ensures that all data is regularly backed up. Overall, MyKidReports is a great solution for preschools looking to streamline their operations and improve parent-teacher communication. With its comprehensive features and easy-to-use interface, MyKidReports has become a go-to software for many preschoolers looking to improve their services.

Description: Your Enterprise AI Copilot
Full Description: Putting state-of-the-art ML and generative AI into the hands of every business stakeholder. AutoIntuit (autointuit.ai) turns every data professional in your org into an expert ML engineer overnight. When you integrate us into your VPC, you get access to a suite of solutions to deploy and scale custom ML and LLM workflows in minutes. It starts with DPT-1, our foundation model for AutoML, which profiles your datasets and designs a tailored modeling solution — complete with optimal hyperparameter values, all the best modeling practices for your domain, and a smart model weights init — for your task description. It continues with our declarative ML interface: make granular customizations to your model pipelines using intuitive high-level YAML. Click to deploy, and our engines manage all of the training MLOps and infra, auto-leveraging our suite of learning accelerators to train up to 10 times faster. Serve into production, make real-time predictive SQL or LLM prompt queries, and build custom applications on top of your models, all on our unified dashboard. We are ex-Google Brain, NVIDIA, and Stanford, and have over 20 years of experience leading research and industry efforts in AutoML, generative AI, and declarative ML. Learn more and book a demo today: hello@autointuit.ai.

Description: KrillPay is a mobile payment application that leverages blockchain technology to facilitate peer-to-peer and cross-border money transfers
Full Description: There are more than 300 million unbanked in Sub-Saharan Africa. What this means is that when their relatives in the United States sent them money, it cost them more money to receive it.  Due to several factors, the Sub-Saharan African corridor is one of the most expensive regions in the world to send remittances to. Lack of access to basic banking services often a delay for the recipient to access the funds sent to them. And when they finally do access the funds, it value had reduced.  KrillPay is solving this problem with a mobile payment application that leverages blockchain technology to facilitate peer-to-peer and cross-border instant money transfers. An end-to-end delivery of funds between the send and receiver. The way it works is that a KrillPay user in the US can send cross-border instant money transfer to another KrillPay user in Africa.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services

Description: Jitsu securely delivers the power of AI and ML for high quality BI decision making.
Full Description: Run 10x faster SQL queries and batch jobs at a fraction of cloud costs compared to alternatives. Querying large amounts of data is expensive and slow. Current solutions require huge amounts of memory to be useful. With Jitsu, thousands of users can each work concurrently on terabytes of data in their data lake using only gigabytes of memory. Linear price/performance with increasing memory offers flexibility in managing SLAs while dramatically lowering cloud costs. Database workloads for ad hoc queries or batch jobs have complete isolation for memory, CPU, SSD and disk. Jitsu offers the highest level of cloud security by using a combination of AWS IAM Roles for machine-to-machine access, OAuth and SSO for enterprises, PostgreSQL grants and privileges for fine-grained Table/Column/Row level access controls, and a complete SaaS offering in your own VPC. Simplify operations and spend less on databases and cloud infrastructure.

Description: GeneLancet Biosciences develops lgRNA-guided precise CRISPR gene editing (STAR editor) as curative human therapeutics.
Full Description: STAR editors comprise lgRNA constructs with self-contained DNA repair templates for precise gene editing and require no additional donor DNA. In addition, lgRNAs exclude certain inactive secondary structures of sgRNAs and thus are more active and potentially decrease drug dosages and related adverse effects. STAR editors are delivered as RNP conjugates or as RNA mixtures in delivery carriers.  LgRNA technology:       LgRNAs are intellectually distinct next-generation single-molecule CRISPR guide RNAs with improved drug properties (US10059940B2). Guide RNA directs where the enzyme cuts and is crucial in precise gene editing. Chemical modifications of guide RNAs are required for better editing efficacy and selectivity, targeted delivery and decreased toxicity and can only be introduced by chemical synthesis. With proprietary cost-effective, robust and scalable chemical manufacturing process, GeneLancet consistently produces best-ever quality single-molecule guide RNAs, lgRNAs. In comparison, high quality synthetic sgRNAs for CRISPR-Cas9 (>70% of full-length product) are not available, the sgRNA product impurity profiles vary significantly between different production lots, and impurities in sgRNA products result in additional off-targets. LgRNAs can replace guide RNAs in all existing CRISPR genetic tools.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, Great Lakes, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Cutting-edge laboratory services that promote precision medicine.
Full Description: Artemis DNA is a full service, Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments (CLIA) certified, College of American Pathologists (CAP) accredited, high-complexity clinical diagnostic laboratory company that provides proprietary Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) genetic testing and diagnostic laboratory services for a wide variety of medical specialties, including cardiology, oncology, immunology, neurology, reproductive health and pharmacogenomics.  Artemis DNA’s testing enhances the delivery of “personalized medicine” by assessing a patient’s own genetic makeup and clinical characteristics which allows for informed decision making in prevention and treatment choices.  Artemis DNA also provides pre- and post-testing genetic education and counseling services, as well as conducting research and development to discover and develop additional novel diagnostic services.  Artemis DNA is headquartered in Irvine, California. For more information, visit https://www.artemisdna.com.
